channel.title: Some crazy ideas, would you support them or should i drop?
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapians, I recently have returned to the RSPS community following I got bored of eveything else(I go in a cycle). Still supporting 317's as the best version, though I came up with some wacky ideas... What if I managed to implement some things from other popular MMORPGs such as World of Warcraft or maplestory? EG a Free Market(Maplestory), or Groups, Guilds and Instances(WoW).
Would you guys like that in a runescape server, and If not maybe there is something else you would like to see... POST IT! Feedback would be nice please guys <3
Peace, Stupid Ninja

item.title: Some crazy ideas, would you support them or should i drop?
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Ninja Stupid Ninja
item.description:
@Stupid_Ninja wrote:

Doesnt go in development but its more of a help topic than general discussion ^^. Need help with what to add? And do you want to answer my question?

Read full topic
